technical-information.title-of-invention: Quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices

subdoc-abstract.paragraph: The present invention relates to a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices, which mainly comprises a cutting unit and a manhole/handhole cover lifter. The cutting unit is mainly composed of a radial feeding device, a cutting plate, a base, and a vessel, and makes the user proceed the cutting task easily by fixing the base and operating the radial feeding device. The main part of the lifter is a single frame, and can be used to lift a manhole/handhole effortlessly due to the principle of the lever. According to the cutting unit and the lifter of a manhole/handhole cover with applying the construction steps for the present invention, the replacement of a manhole/handhole can be done quickly.

section.heading: BACKGROUND OF THE INVENTION
section.paragraph: [0001] 1. Field of the Invention

[0002] The present invention relates to a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices whereof some simple and convenient units, such as a cutting unit with quickly positioning ability and a manhole/handhole lifter, etc., are applied due to characteristics of these devices and corresponding constuction steps of the present invention to proceed the technology of quick replacement of a manhole/handhole.
[0003] 2. Description of the Prior Art

[0004] A commonly known manhole/handhole is the outlet of the culvert or sewer for burying electrical cables and water pipes. In order to connect the manhole/handhole set with the culvert correctly, the manhole/handhole has to to be set by the method of locking. When the road surface is varied due to repair of the road, or damage of the manhole/handhole, the manhole/handhole needs to be replaced. The common task encountered is how a manhole/handhole is moved easily and effortlessly, and then how a manhole/handhole set fastened on the culvert is removed away, and the latter is the most difficult thing actually. The commonly seen construction method of replacing a manhole/handhole is that firstly the manhole/handhole seat is taken out by destroying methods of sapping the road surface and digging the culvert, and after the new manhole/handhole is placed, the culvert and the road surface is filled up. The construction described above wastes not only time but also effort, and structure of the original culvert and the road surface is destroyed such that the life is reduced. Commonly seen manhole cover moving devices, such as Taiwan Patent 380654, A manhole cover moving device, is made up with a support set, a jack mechanism, a steering mechanism and a turning grip. When the structure described above is used, the jack is fastened first, and other mechanisms are extended one by one for operation. Therefore, the device is inconvenient to use, and needs to be folded up after using or otherwise, it occupies much space. In addition, Taiwan patent 243877 and Taiwan patent 262900, “Tools for lifting and moving a manhole cover with rolling tubes, prying tubes, hooks, and a crowbar”, need many tools such that much resource is used for bringing these tools, and, besides, these tools have to work in coordination with each other, and if the user loses one of these tools, practicability of these tools is decreased substantially.

[0005] In addition, what has to be mentioned especially is that for replacement of a manhole/handhole, were it not for advanced countries, such as Japan, with huge capital for researching and manufacturing, common methods of replacement of a manhole/handhole still use manpower or machines to proceed digging and replacing. In addition to that time and effort is wasted for the task, as long as the task is proceeded in the advanced country with vast area, speed of replacement can't keep up with speed of damage. How the replacement of the manhole/handhole is proceeded with more efficiency and less human and commodity resources is the thing done well only in advanced countries. For example, the manhole/handhole replacement related equipments from Japan (referring to Ref.(1) and Ref.(2)) costs over ten million NT such that people hang back, and needs much manpower to operate and transport. Thus it can be shown that the construction method of a manhole/handhole has many disadvantages and is really not a perfect design such that it is need improved.

[0006] The inventor of the present invention ruminated over the disadvantages resulted from the habitually used manhole/handhole construction method and related devices, and earnestly deliberated the way of improvement and innovation. After studying hard for a long period, the inventor eventually succeeded in inventing the present invention, a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices.

section.heading: SUMMARY OF THE INVENTION
section.paragraph: [0007] The purpose of the present invention is to provide a quick manhole/handhole construction device, which uses feeding screws of the cutting unit and the theory of planet gear mechanism to make the cutting unit position quickly and proceed horizontal cutting task.

[0008] The second purpose of the present invention is to provide a quick manhole/handhole construction device, which uses the extended screw feeding mechanism to make the cutting unit add the function of cutting surface of an asphalt road around the manhole/handhole.

[0009] Another purpose of the present invention is to provide a quick manhole/handhole construction device, which uses the position hook of the present invention to make the cutting unit reach the position quickly when the cutting unit is placed into a manhole/handhole or a culvert.

[0010] Another further purpose of the present invention is to provide a quick manhole/handhole construction device, which is a single frame combined with a pair of fastened wheels and a pair of mobile wheels, and uses the principle of the lever to move the manhole/handhole cover quickly and effortlessly.

[0011] The other purpose of the present invention is to provide a quick manhole/handhole construction method, which can proceed replacing the manhole/handhole cover smoothly via every unit of the present invention even if under the condition that the resource is limited.

[0012] The related device corresponding to a quick manhole/handhole construction method that can achieve purposes described above at least comprises a cutting unit and a lifter. The cutting unit further comprises:

[0013] a radial feeding device whereof a pneumatic motor (or a hydraulic motor) and a screw feeding mechanism are combined, and connection of the screw feeding mechanism and the fixing holder of the chassis can separately add an extended screw feeding mechanism, and a fastening holder is fixed at the final end of the screw feeding mechanism and is normal to the fixing holder of the chassis, and at this time, the radial feeding device can be fastened on the fastening holder of the extended screw feeding mechanism;
[0014] a cutting plate, which is a circular blade unit covered by a shelter, which has a placing prop fastened at the proper position of the exterior;

[0015] a chassis whereon a fixing holder is set and a column casing is appended at the proper position of periphery, and a steering gear mechanism is set at the top of the column casing, and a shaft is extended downward from the steering gear mechanism, and a planet gear is fastened on the shaft;

[0016] a base that a fixed gear is fastened on the upper surface of the base and at least three extending arms which can be controlled via adjusting screws and set on the bottom face continuously with dividing the area of the bottom face with equal parts;
[0017] a vessel connecting with an output duct and being able to placed into the placing prop set on the shelter;

[0018] wherein the shelter and the radial feeding device is fastened to the fixing holder of the chassis, and the blade of the cutting plate is fastened to the pneumatic motor of the radial feeding device, and the chassis is set at the top of the base, and make the planet gear set on the chassis be able to engage with the fixed gear set on the base. The lifter further comprises:
[0019] a frame, wherein some symmetrical position holes locates at some proper positions;
[0020] a pair of fastened wheels containing two wheels, which are respectively set at two sides of one end of the frame;
[0021] a pair of mobile wheels containing two wheels, which are respectively appended a with a mobile link, which is joined at two sides of the frame;

[0022] a hook module, whereof the main part is a stick with two sleeves, which have positioning holes and can slide on the frame, respectively set at two ends, and a pair of other mobile sleeves respectively having hooks at the bottom and several poisoning holes at the top;
[0023] a plurality of the positioning pins for fastening the hook module;
[0024] a pair of folding units, which comprises two foldable links and a string;
[0025] a stopping unit comprising at least a stopping plate, which is fixed at a suitable position of said frame and make said frame not to contact the ground when said frame is horizontally placed;

[0026] wherein said pair of fastened wheels are respectively set at both sides of one end of said frame, and corresponds to said pair of mobile wheels, and said pair of folding units are used to link fastened wheels and mobile wheels, and said pair of folding units are connected by a string passing through said frame such that when said string is pulled, said pair of fastened wheels and said pair of mobile wheels can be pulled by said pair of folding units and said foldable links between wheels can be folded; and wherein a pair of the positioning pins can pass through the poisoning holes of the hook module and the frame at the same time such that quick position of the mobile hooks can be done.
[0027] A construction method corresponding to the devices for quick construction of a manhole/handhole comprises at least steps as follows:
[0028] Step1, Using a lifter to lift and move a manhole/handhole;
[0029] Step2, Placing and positioning the cutting unit into the manhole/handhole, and using the cutting unit to cut the surface of the asphalt road above the manhole/handhole;
[0030] Step3, Placing and positioning the cutting unit into the culvert and using the cutting unit to cut the culvert connected to the bottom of the manhole/handhole;
[0031] Step4, Hanging away the manhole/handhole;
[0032] Step5, Placing a new manhole/handhole;
[0033] Step6, Using the lifter to move and cover the manhole/handhole cover;
[0034] Step7. Laying the surface of the asphalt road above the manhole/handhole.

section.heading: BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE DRAWINGS
section.paragraph: [0035] The drawings disclose an illustrative embodiment of the present invention which serves to exemplify the various advantages and objects hereof, and are as follows:
[0036] FIG. 1 3D view of the cutting unit of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices of the present invention;
[0037] FIG. 2 Decomposed diagram of the cutting unit of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices;

[0039] FIG. 3(B) 3D view of the extended screw feedind mechanism of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices;
[0040] FIG. 3(C) 3D view of the fastening holder appended with the dust cover of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices;
[0041] FIG. 4(A) Lateral view of horizontally cutting the culvert of the cutting unit of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices;
[0042] FIG. 4(B) Lateral view of normally cutting the surface of an asphalt road of the cutting unit of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices;
[0043] FIG. 5 3D view of the lifter of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices;
[0044] FIG. 6(A) Lateral view of the lifter under hanging a manhole/handhole cover of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices;
[0045] FIG. 6(B) Lateral view of the lifter under moving a manhole/handhole cover of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices;
[0046] FIG. 7 Flowchart of construction steps of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices;
[0047] FIG. 8(A) 3D view of the fastening position hooks of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices;
[0048] FIG. 8(B) 3D view of the mobile position hooks of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices;
[0049] FIG. 8(C) 3D view of the appliance of the position hooks of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices;

[0051] REF. (2) Habitually used manhole/handhole construction method and related devices 2;

section.heading: DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF THE PREFERRED EMBODIMENT
section.paragraph: [0052] Please refer to FIG. 1 and FIG. 2, FIG. 1 is the 3D view of the cutting unit of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices, and FIG. 2 is the decomposed diagram of the cutting unit of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices. The cutting unit 1 is mainly composed of a radial feeding device 1a, a cutting plate 1b, a chassis 1c, a base 1d and a vessel w. The radial feeding device 1a is mainly composed of a pneumatic motor 1a1 and a screw feeding mechanism 1a6. The pneumatic motor 1a1 is set on a housing 1a2, and a turning wheel 1a3 is set at one end of the housing 1a2, and then the shaft of the turning wheel is extended such that a bevel gear 1a31 can be set. A hole 1a41 is set at the proper position of the guide block, and has threads. Both sides of the top of the guide block 1a4 respectively have a sliding trench, and the top of the guide block 1a4 is fastened to the bottom of the housing 1a2. Both sides of the bottom of the sliding block 15 respectively has a slideway 1a51, and one end of the sliding block 1a5 has a stopping block 1a52 joining a screw 1a53, and the screw 1a53 can rotate at the joint between the screw 1a53 and the stopping block 1a52, and then a bevel gear 1a54 for engaging with the bevel gear 1a31 of the extended shaft of the turning wheel 1a3 is set at one end of the screw 1a53. The cutting plate 1b is a circular blade unit 1b4 covered with a shelter, and the blade unit 1b4 is made of a blade 1b2 with locking the lock plate 1b3 on the blade 1b2 via screws S4, and a hole 1b31 operating in coordination with the shaft of the pneumatic motor 1a11 is set at the center of the lock plate 1b3, and a placing prop 1b11 and a pair of fixing plate 1b12 are set at the proper positions of the exterior of the shelter 1b1. The chassis 1c mainly comprises a chassis shield cover 1c6, and a fixing holder 1c4 is set on the chassis shield cover 1c6, and the fixing holder 1c4 has a gap 1c5, and an extended column casing is set at the proper position on the chassis shield cover 1c6, and a steering gear mechanism 1c1 is set at the top of the column casing 1c8, and the steering gear mechanism 1c1 extends downward a shaft 1c2 whereon a planet gear 1c3 is fastened, and a guide shaft 1c7 is set below the chassis shield cover 1c6. A base plate 1d4 having a fixed gear 1d41 is set on the base 1d, and the fixed gear 1d41 engages with the planet gear 1c3 of the chassis 1c, and three extending arms 1d1, 1d2, 1d3 with the same structure is set at the bottom of the base plate with dividing the area of the bottom surface into equal parts, and the extending arms 1d1, 1d2, 1d3 can be adjusted and controlled by screws. The extended arm 1d1 comprises a fastening set, which is slipped on the screw bolt 1d13, and a fastening nut 1d12 is set at the proper position of the screw bolt 1d13, and the end without connecting fastening set 1d11 of the screw bolt 1d13 can be arranged in pair with the screw hole 1d16 of the internal sleeve 1d14, and the internal sleeve 1d14 can be used together with the external sleeve 1d15 and the position can be fixed by coordination of a screw S5 and a nut S6 (the structure of the extending arm 1d2 and 1d3 are the same as the extending arm 1d1), and a support set 1d42 is set above the base 1d, and a guiding hole 1d43 is set at the center of the support set 1d42. A duct w1 is connected to the proper position of the exterior of the vessel w. The fixing plate 1b12 of the cutting plate 1b, the screw S1 and S2 are fixed on the fixing holder 1c4 of the chassis, and the lock plate 1b3 of the cutting plate 1b is fixed at the bottom of the pneumatic motor 1a1, and the hole 1b31 set on the lock plate 1b3 can work in coordination with the shaft 1a11 of the pneumatic motor 1a1, and the vessel w can be set at the placing prop 1b11 of the cutting plate 1b. The guide shaft 1c7 of the chassis 1c is inset into the guiding hole 1d43 of the chassis 1d, and the planet gear 1c3 can engage with the fixed gear of the base 1d.

[0053] Refer to FIG. 3(A),(B), FIG. 3(A) is the decomposed view of the extended screw feeding mechanism of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices, and FIG. 3(B) is the 3D view of the extended screw feeding mechanism of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices. The main structure of the extended screw feeding mechanism 6 comprises a guide block 65, a sliding block 63, a fastening prop 68 and a fixing holder 69, and a turning wheel 62 is set at one end of the sliding block 63, and a steering bevel gear pair 61 is set at the extended shaft of the turning wheel 62, and the bevel gear pair 61 is added a screw 631, which is joined on the block 632 of the sliding block 63, and a set of slideway 64 is set at the bottom of the sliding block 63, and a fixing holder 69 is set at the other end of the sliding block 63, and the fixing holder 69 can be appended with a dust cover 691(referring to FIG. 3(C)). The fastening prop 68 is fixed at the bottom of the guide block 65, and a sliding trough 66 is set at the interior of the guide block 65, and a pair of sliding slots 67 is set at the bottom of the sliding trough 66. The screw holes 671 parallel to the sliding trough 66 are set at proper positions of the guide block 65. The slideway 64 of the sliding block 63 can slide in coordination with the sliding slots 67 of the guide block 65, and the screw 631 of the sliding block 63 can operate in coordination with the screw hole 671 of the guide block 65.

[0054] Please refer to FIG. 4(A), which is the lateral view of the cutting unit under cutting a culvert horizontally of a quick manhole/handhole construction and related devices, when the cutting unit 1 of the present invention is placed into a culvert H1, the internal sleeve 1d14 and the external sleeve 1d15 of the extending arms 1d1, 1d2 and 1d3 are fastened by the screw S5 after being adjusted to proper position(the adjusting motion of structure of 1d2 and 1d3 are the same as that of 1d1), and then the fastening nut 1d12 on the screw bolt 1d13 is turned to make the fastening set 1d11 set on the screw bolt 1d13 be able to hold at the inner wall of the culvert H1, and at this time, the turning wheel 1a3 of the radial feeding mechanism 1a can be turned to make the bevel gear 1a31 turn, and the gear 1a54 is driven to drive the screw 1a53, and then the housing 1a2 of the radial feeding mechanism 1a shifts due to turn of the screw 1a53 such that the pneumatic motor 1a1 on the housing 1a2 is driven simultaneously, and further the circular blade 1b2 is driven because the lock plate 1b3 fixed at the bottom of the pneumatic motor 1a1. After the circular blade 1b2 starts to contact the inner wall of the culvert H1 due to turning the turning wheel 1a3 of the radial feeding mechanism 1a, the user can go on turning the turning wheel 1a3 to decide cutting depth, and the shelter 1b1 of the cutting unit 1b can avoid splashing cut pieces. When the circular blade 1b2 reach the cutting depth, the user can turn the turning grip 1c12 of the steering gear mechanism 1c1 to drive the bevel gear pair 1c11 such that the shaft 1c2 of the chassis 1d is driven to drive the planet gear 1c3 and further the fixed gear 1d41 is driven, and then the cutting plate 1b of the radial feeding device 1a is driven to have circular motion due to rotation of the fixed gear 1d41. The velocity of circular motion of the cutting plate 1b is the cutting speed of the cutting unit under cutting the culvert H1, and the manhole/handhole set H2 can be taken out after cutting task is finished.

[0055] Please refer to FIG. 4(B), which is the lateral view of the cutting unit under normally cutting the surface of an asphalt road of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices, and FIG. 3(A), FIG. 3(B), an extended screw feeding mechanism 6 can also be added into the cutting unit to work in coordination with the cutting task before the present invention is used to cut the culvert H1. First, the extending arms 1d1, 1d2, and 1d3 are used to hold the base 1d in the manhole/handhole H2, then the radial feeding mechanism and the cutting plate 1b described above are set and used, and then the guide block 1a4 of the radial feeding mechanism 1a is fastened on the fastening holder 69 of the extended feeding mechanism 6, and the fastening prop 68 is fixed on the fixing holder 1c4 of the chassis 1c via screws S7, and for increasing the stability of the present invention after the extended screw feeding mechanism is added, a slice S can be added on the fixing holder 1c4 of the chassis 1c. When the user operates the turning wheel 62, the sliding block 63 is driven in the guide block 65, and the movement of the sliding block 63 would drive the radial feeding mechanism 1a to move in the direction parallel to the surface of an asphalt road AC. (the amount of the displacement would determine the area of the asphalt road to be cut). After determining the amount of the displacement of the radial feeding mechanism 1a, the user can operate the turning wheel 1a3 to adjust the amount of the displacement of circular blade 1b2 (i.e. the depth of the area of the asphalt road to be cut). Then the user operates the turning grip 1c12 to drive the planet gear 1c3, meanwhile, the planet gear 1c3 would drive the fixed gear 1d4 (which is the cut speed of cutting the surface of the asphalt road). In this way, cutting unit 1 can proceed the task of cutting circular path according to the amount of the displacement of the radial feeding device, the feeding amount of the cutting plate, and the cutting speed of the fixed gear 1d4.

[0056] Please refer to FIG. 5, which is the 3D view of the lifter of a quick manhole/handhole construction and its related devices, the lifter 2 is composed of a frame 21, a pair of fastened wheels 4a, a pair of mobile wheels 4b, a hook module 2a, several positioning pins m, a pair of folding unit 31 and 32, a string 24, and a stopping unit 23. Several symmetrical position holes 27 and 28 are set at the proper position on the frame 21. In addition, a pair of fastened wheels 4a, which contains a wheel 41 and a wheel 42, is set on the both sides of one end of the frame 21. The pair of mobile wheels 4b contains the wheel 43 and 44, on which the mobile link 51 and 52 joined at two sides of the frame 21 are appended. The hook module 2a mainly composed of a stick 26, and a pair of mobile sleeves 261, 262 are set on the stick 26, and hooks 263, 264 are respectively set at the bottom of the mobile sleeves 261, 262, and several positioning holes n2 are set at the top of the mobile sleeves 261,262, and several positioning holes n2 are set on the stick n2. A pair of sleeves 265, 266 is set at both ends of the stick 26, and the sleeves 265, 266 can slide on the frame 21, and the position holes 291, 301 are respectively set on the sleeves 265, 266. The positioning pins m can be used to fix the hook module 2a. The folding units 31 and 32 respectively contain a pair of foldable links 311, 312 and 321, 322. The stopping unit 23 contains a stopping plate 231, which is fixed at the proper position of the frame 21, to make the frame 21 avoid from contacting the ground when the frame 21 is placed down horizontally. The wheel 41 and the wheel 42 of the pair of fastened wheels 4a are respectively set at both sides of one end of the frame 21, and the pair of mobile wheels is joined at the exterior of the pair of fastened wheels 4a and corresponds to the pair of fastened wheels. A pair of folding units 31, 32 is used to link fastened wheels 4a and mobile wheels 4b, and the pair of folding units 31, 32 is connected by a string 24 passing through the frame 21 such that when the string is pulled, the pair of fastened wheels 4a and the pair of mobile wheels 4b can be pulled by the pair of folding units 31, 32 such that the foldable links between the pair of fastened wheels 4a and the pair of mobile wheels 4b can be folded. The positioning pins m of can simultaneously pass through the poisoning holes n1 of the mobile sleeves of the hook module 2a, the positioning holes n2 of the stick 26, the positioning holes 27, 28 on the frame 21 such that position of the mobile hooks 263,264 of the hook module 2a can be done.

[0057] Please refer to FIG. 6(A), FIG. 6(B), FIG. 6(C), FIG. 6(A) is the lateral view of the lifter under hanging a manhole/handhole cover of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices, and FIG. 6(B) is the lateral view of the lifter under moving a manhole/handhole of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices. When lifting the manhole/handhole H3, the user first pull the string 24, and both ends of the string 24 can pull the folding unit 31, 32 such that the foldable link 311,312 and 321,322 are folded. When the folding units 31, 32 are folded, the foldable links 312, 322 respectively can pull the mobile links 51, 52. After the folding units 31, 32 are folded, the mobile links 51 and 52 can pull the pair of mobile wheels 4b to the exterior of the pair of the fastened wheels 4a. At this time, the user places the frame 21 downward (the hands of the user can be protected from press due to the stopping plate 231 of the stopping unit 23). The mobile sleeves 261, 262, and the sleeves 264, 265 are adjusted, and at the same time, the positioning pins m are used to pass through the position holes n1, position holes 291 and 301, then hooks 264, and 265 are used to hang the manhole/handhole, and the manhole/handhole H3 can be lifted easily because of the lever principle (i.e. the point contacting ground of the pair of fastened wheels 4a are supports, and the hanging positions of the hook module 2a are anti-force points, and the other end opposite to the pair of fastened wheels are force-applying points). After the manhole/handhole H3 is lifted, the string 24 is loosened and then, the pair of the mobile wheels 4b can pull the folding units 31 and 32 to the horizontal state due to the momentum of the wheel 43 and the wheel 44, and the manhole/handhole H3 can be lifted then. In this way, the user can easily move a manhole/handhole H3 by the mobility of the pair of fastened wheels 4a and mobile wheels 4b.
[0058] Please refer to FIG. 7, which is the flowchart of construction steps of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices, the construction can be divided into steps as follow:
[0059] Step1 81, Using a lifter to lift and move a manhole/handhole;
[0060] Step2 82, Placing and positioning the cutting unit into the manhole/handhole, and using the cutting unit to cut the surface of the asphalt road above the manhole/handhole;
[0061] Step3 83, Placing and positioning the cutting unit into the culvert, and using the cutting unit to cut the culvert connected to the bottom of the manhole/handhole;
[0062] Step4 84, Hanging away the manhole/handhole;
[0063] Step5 85, Placing new manhole/handhole;
[0064] Step6 86, Using the lifter to move and cover the manhole/handhole cover;
[0065] Step7 87, Laying the surface of the asphalt road above the manhole/handhole.
[0066] Applying the devices, mechanisms and operation method described above can proceed smoothly the construction method of the present invention.

[0067] Please refer to FIG. 8(A), FIG. 8(B), FIG. 8(C), FIG. 8(A) is the 3D view of the fastening position hooks of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices, and FIG. 8(B) is the 3D view of the mobile position hooks of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices, and,FIG. 8(C) is the 3D view of the appliance of the position hooks of a quick manhole/handhole construction method and related devices. When the cutting unit 1 is placed into the culvert H1 or manhole/handhole H2, the position hooks 7 having the same size can be taken together to fasten via grappling the extending arms 1d1, 1d2, 1d3 of the base 1d by the hook 71. When insetting motion is proceeded, the stick 72 of the position hook 7 can be lodged at the outer fringe of the culvert H1 and manhole/handhole H2 (as the position hooks 7a, 7b, and 7c shown in FIG. 8(C)) to make quick position done. Besides, length of the position hook 7d can also be adjusted by the method of using positioning pins m2.
[0068] With comparing to the quoted case or other habitually used technologies, the quick manhole/handhole method and related devices from the present invention has advantages as follows:
[0069] (1) Power needed to drive the blade is little, so less energy is consumed.
[0070] (2) The task of replacement of the manhole/handhole can be proceeded quickly and efficiently.
[0071] (3) Because the components of the present invention are simple, the cost is low, and the operation is easy, and less operating staff is needed.
[0072] (4) The cutting task with using the present invention makes the cut surface neat and not have bursting condition resulted from traditionally hammering method with more maintaining cost.

[0073] (5) The present invention uses a pneumatic motor or a hydraulic motor to serve as the driving force for driving the cutting blade, and, therefore, the worry that inflammable gas such as marsh gas is enkindled can be avoided.

[0074] (6) The lifter of the present invention is use the level principle to achieve the effort-saving purpose, and move the manhole/handhole easily and quickly. Besides, the structure is simple, and operation is easy, and the type is not limited.

[0075] Many changes and modifications in the above described embodiment of the invention can, of course, be carried out without departing from the scope thereof. Accordingly, to promote the progress in science and the useful arts, the invention is disclosed and is intended to be limited only by the scope of the appended claims.

claim.claim-text: 3. A quick manhole/handhole construction method and a plurality of related devices as recited in claim 1, wherein an extended screw feeding mechanism can be appended into connection of said screw feeding mechanism and said fixing holder of said chassis, and a fastening holder normal to said fixing holder is fixed at one end of said extended screw feeding mechanism, and said radial feeding mechanism can be fastened to said fastening holder of said extended screw feeding mechanism.

5. A quick manhole/handhole construction method as recited in claim 4, wherein for said step2, i.e. placing said cutting unit into said manhole/handhole, a position hook with the same size can be used together to fasten via grappling said extending arms of said base by said position hook and, then placing task can be kept on to make position done quickly.

6. A quick manhole/handhole construction method as recited in claim 4, wherein for said step 3, i.e. placing said cutting unit into said culvert or said manhole/handhole, said position hook with the same size can be used together to fasten via grappling said extending arms of said base by said position hook and then placing task can be kept on to make position done quickly, and length of said hook can be adjusted by a position pin.
7. A quick manhole/handhole construction method as recited in claim 4, wherein said pneumatic motor can be replaced by a hydraulic motor.
